articles.description: This year, holiday stargazers will get an extra special treat as two "Stars of Bethlehem" light up the night sky.
articles.content: The night sky can present some incredible sights at any time of year, and winter is no exception. Those who are willing to brave the chillier temperatures can witness what many consider the "best met… [+3630 chars]
